attributes.action: Recognise the England football team with official honours for unifying England
attributes.additional_details: Gareth Southgate and his team have shown remarkable fortitude on the back of overwhelming expectation. Respectfully and passionately furthering the course of the England national football team. Giving much to the country in a time beset with worry. They need to know their country appreciates them.
attributes.background: Officially honour members of the England national football team and their management through the honours system as and where appropriate and for the prime minister and or queen to hold a reception in their honour.

rejection.details: You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour at http://www.gov.uk/honours
